description.value:
Trigger you stand up from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone] after waking up from being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious]

You refuse to yield the battle, even after you've been knocked off your feet and nearly killed. For you, such a brush with death is less something to fear and more a thing to become infuriated by. As you stand up, you roar in defiance and can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Demoralize] a foe.
